Title: Mock Two Piece Halter Prom Dress

----

Sku: 8705

Sizes: 12, 14, 6, 10, 4, 8

Colors: coral, skyblue

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: 8705-sky-blue-mock-two-piece-halter-prom-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This mock two piece gown is perfect for any stylish prom night. It features a halter top with a cross patterned back. The bodice has beading around the neckline extending to the waistline. Sheer cut away gives the appearance of an open waist with belted accent. The highwaisted , floor length skirt adds elegance to this flirty look.
